issue.title: std::ranges::shuffle synopsis does not match algorithm definition

discussion.p: Notice the missing ConvertibleTo requirements in the latter. Looking at the Ranges TS, includes this requirement, albeit in the Ranges TS-format.
Given that the accepted proposal P0896R4 voted in San Diego did contain the same error I decided to open this issue instead of submitting an editorial change request.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4800.
